title: Introducing: Boys In Lilies
content:
You’d think everyone would have heard enough French electronic music to last them a lifetime by now.

That’s not to belittle the strength of Boys In Lilies debut EP, Hatching, a hugely promising release, that improves in quality as each track goes by. Opening with the melancholic, slightly underwhelming twinkle of Ode To Sailors, by the time the group from Tours flow effortlessly into Runaway, you’ll be well and truly in love. With the playful vocals of lead singer Laure Berneau intertwining gorgeously with the glittering synth and guitar sections, Boys In Lilies carve out a sound that is immediately accesible, yet entirely their own. Check out EP highlight The Bird below, and the full EP under that. Well and truly one of the most beautiful new artists of 2013.
